Follow me, let's install LYSEE into your computer and run it.

*LINUX*

    # Download lysee source to your computer.
    # Unizp it.
    # Copy libc package of Free Pascal to your home place.
    # Change to folder _LYSEE_SOURCE/lysee_.
    # Compile with: make.
    # Install with: sudo make install.
    # Lysee will be installed to _/usr/local/lib/lysee_.
    # Soft link _/usr/bin/lysee_ will be created and pointer to _/usr/local/lib/lysee/lysee_.
    # Type "lysee" and return will start lysee.

*WINDOWS*

    # Download the lasted Win32 installer to your computer.
    # Run the installer.
    # Follow Start->Programs->Lysee 0.1.9->Lysee Interpreter to start Lysee.
